mapper.insert: insert into mkt_strategy (STRATEGY_ID, STRATEGY_NAME, STRATEGY_TYPE, STRATEGY_DESC, RULE_EXPRESSION, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID) values (#{strategyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{strategyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strategyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strategyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update mkt_strategy set STRATEGY_NAME = #{strategyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STRATEGY_TYPE = #{strategyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STRATEGY_DESC = #{strategyDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RULE_EXPRESSION = #{ruleExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAN_ID = #{lanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where STRATEGY_ID = #{strategyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select STRATEGY_ID, STRATEGY_NAME, STRATEGY_TYPE, STRATEGY_DESC, RULE_EXPRESSION, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_strategy where STRATEGY_ID = #{strategyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select STRATEGY_ID, STRATEGY_NAME, STRATEGY_TYPE, STRATEGY_DESC, RULE_EXPRESSION, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_strategy
